name: iKeyboard -GIF keyboard,Funny Emoji, FREE Stickers
description: New Emoji Keyboard with fun emojis, emoticons & smiley faces -Free to type cool emoji & emoticons on Message, SMS, Text Now, Email, Note, etc -Easy to send emoji message with various funny emoji & text emoticons  -Innovative emoji prediction with emoji dictionary  Sticker & GIF Keyboard -Send stickers/clip art and GIFs on any social Apps -Lots of funny animated GIFs to choose, such as photo GIFs, cat GIFs & Emotion GIFs  Custom Keyboard & Photo Keyboard -5000+ keyboard themes to decorate your keyboard style and new themes are delivered weekly -Personalize keyboard color, font, key press sound -Set keyboard backgroud with pictures from gallery or camera -Resize keypad with one-handed mode and split keyboard layout for phone and tablet -Make a music keyboard with many different sound like piano, violin, guitar and  more  Fast typing - Slide input: slide your finger key to key swiftly  - Smart auto-correction & word prediction help you kill typos  - Voice Board: Easy voice type on the go with Voice Board   Bilingual Keyboard supports 150+ language - Including QWERTY keyboard, AZERTY keyboard, English(US)(UK) ,Portuguese(Brazil)(Portugal) ,Spanish keyboard, Germany Keyboard, Ukrainian keyboard, Thailand keyboard ,Turkish keyboard, etc.  Contact us  Like us on FB: https://www.facebook.com/iKeyboard1/ Support Email: ikeyboard2016@gmail.com Business Inquiries: ikeyboard.business@gmail.com
